column1: The '''''The 1985 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Ballantine Books]] in [[1984]]. It features art by [[Inger Edelfeldt]] based on ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' and ''[[The Silmarillion]]''.
* Cover - "[[:File:Inger Edelfeldt - Pippin and Merry Captured by Orcs.jpg
column2: Pippin and Merry Captured by Orcs]]"
